extensionDescription.message: Extension that sets a default fixed zoom for all pages in Firefox

subheaderZoomRules.description: Zoom rules for a specific website

restoreButton.description: Restores all tabs back to the default zoom

newRuleFor.description: Creates a new rule for a specific website

newSiteDescription.message: Toggle the switch to change only this site's zoom level.

rulesBySiteSubheader.message: Create a different zoom level for a website

rulesBySiteDescription1.message: To set a specific zoom for a website, enter the site's domain name (such as

rulesBySiteDescription2.message: , pick a custom zoom to your liking and click on "add a new rule".

partialRuleButton.message: Want to add more advanced rules?

partialRuleDescription.message: If you wish to match only part of the url, for example all the domains that contain the word fruit, just begin the word with a #. For example #fruit would match freshfruits.com and reddit.com/r/fruit.

advancedSettingsRegexTitle.message: Allow regular expressions when creating rules

advancedSettingsAutoRuleTitle.message: Save site rule on manual zoom change

shortcutKeysLabel.message: You can set the extension zoom with CTRL ALT , and CTRL ALT .

shortcutKeysLink.message: The shortcuts can be modified here:

allowProfilesTitle.message: Enable multiple zoom profiles for the extension.

newProfileLabel.message: Select a name for the new profile.
